name: HAMMER WORLD: DIMENSION TRAVELER
description:
WHAT IS HAMMER WORLD?
"HAMMER WORLD: DIMENSION TRAVELER" is a first-person metroidvania with physics-based combat built in Unreal Engine 4. Explore mysterious dimensions, unlock new abilities, and fight back against evil with your hammer friend!GAME SYSTEM
This game features non-linear exploration through a variety of interconnected worlds.

Venture forth and:
  • Upgrade your hammer and unlock new combat and traversal abilities!
  • Master the physics-based melee combat system!
  • Fight a variety of strange enemies and test your mettle against fearsome bosses!
  • Uncover secret areas and hidden challenges!
MORE INFO SOON!
HAMMER WORLD is currently in active development. More updates coming soon!
